thread.title: Daft Punk Now Have Their Own Snapchat Filter
thread.title_full: Daft Punk Now Have Their Own Snapchat Filter

author: Britt Julious For THUMP
title: Daft Punk Now Have Their Own Snapchat Filter
text:
February 12, 2017 8:57   
Photo courtesy of the artists. 
Snapchat is known for its fun, weird, unique and seasonal filters. And their latest filter, dedicated to Daft Punk , just might be the best one yet. 
In addition to a version of their signature helmets, the filter also includes audio from their track "Doin' it Right," off their last full-length album, Random Access Memories , and "One More Time," from their 2001 album, Discovery . 
The filter debuted yesterday on the app with little explanation. But it doesn't come as too much of a surprise. 
The duo will perform at the ceremony with the Weeknd for their number one single "Starboy." And over the weekend, the duo opened their first pop-up shop , filled with Daft Punk apparel, memorabilia and other collector's items. Skrillex even headlined the store's opening. In 2017, Dat Punk also celebrates the 20th anniversary of their seminal album, Homework . 
Preview the Daft Punk Snapchat filter below. 
This is the best snapchat filter ? â€” Denver (@denv10) February 12, 2017 Topics:
